description: Main application source file for a Flutter-based mobile app. It includes widget definitions, state management with Provider, routing, and stub implementations for authentication and feature pages.

classes.name: AuthState
classes.description: Manages user authentication state, including login/logout and token storage, notifying listeners on changes.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: The root widget configuring the app theme, routes, and home widget with authentication gating.

classes.name: _AuthGate
classes.description: Routes to either the login page or the main rooms page depending on auth status.

classes.name: LoginPage
classes.description: Stub login screen with email/password form, simulating login and integrating with AuthState.

classes.name: _LoginPageState
classes.description: Stateful logic for handling login form, validation, and submission.

classes.name: RegisterPage
classes.description: Stub registration screen with form fields and simulated submission.

classes.name: _RegisterPageState
classes.description: Stateful logic for registration form handling.

classes.name: RoomsListPage
classes.description: Page listing available rooms with mock data, including logout and navigation actions.

classes.name: BookingCreatePage
classes.description: Stub page for creating a booking, currently only displaying a mock confirmation.

classes.name: LoyaltyPage
classes.description: Displays loyalty program info, greeting the user and showing mock points.

methods.name: AuthState.login
methods.description: Sets auth token and email, notifies listeners.

methods.name: AuthState.logout
methods.description: Clears auth token and email, notifies listeners.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initializes Flutter, loads environment variables, and runs the app with providers.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Creates a minimal theme for the application.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Simulates user login, updates auth state, navigates to main pages.
